title: Cornu copia, a miscellanium of lucriferous and most fructiferous experiments, observations and discoveries immethodically distributed to be really demonstrated and communicated in all sincerity.
author: Hartlib, Samuel, d. 1662.
notes: Attributed to Samuel Hartlib. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
